title: Soup√ßons
overview: Victoire moves to southeastern France with her family. In the small village where she now lives, she meets Florent, her childhood love. Despite the years gone by, the attraction is still there, and very soon, they give in to their passion. Both married with kids, this situation rapidly becomes unmanageable. But just as they are about to leave their respective partners, Florent's wife suddenly disappears.
